Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone connecting two students to show how people communicate over long distances.
The student can illustrate the use of sound for communication in the drawing.
The student can show only using the materials provided, like cups and string, in their drawing.
The student can highlight how the device (string telephone) allows communication, showing it meets its purpose.
The student can represent the string telephone as a solution to communicate using sound instead of light.
